Description.Name: To Be Continued
Description.Details:
Congratulations...!

If you're seeing this you have braved the machinations and intrigue of Mr. Smith and survived...so far.

You have rescued the fair maiden, made several enemies and earned Allies and hopefully made a little money along the way.

This is just a pause in the frantic pace of  'Operation - Deep Strike' and I hope you'll be here to the end.

Be on the lookout for the continaution 'Laying down with Dogs'.

Description.Name: Continue...
Description.Details:
This Flashpoint campaign has been made possible by so many people in the Battletech community that if I miss mentioning any one it is totally my omission and I don't get a lot of space in here to type stuff.

The creators of Battletech.
Those Guardians of knowledge who roam the halls of Sarna.net.
The amazingly talented people at HBS.
Amechwarrior - who opened my eyes to what is be possible.
Edmon - who envisaged a more balanced Battletech game.
DonZappo - who made Ed's vision a reality.
Eck - ever willing to help with the inner mysteries of the game.
CWolf and Jamie Wolf - who added such spice to the game.
The army of people on the BT-R discord channel ready and willing to test my Flashpoints and answer my stupid questions.
I don't have enough room to mention you all - but you know.

To Tex of the BPL - The 'voice' of the Innershpere - I salute you.

And finally, those who are reading this - you, who have spent your valuable time playing my Flashpoints, I hope you find them enjoyable and challenging. 

Hang on, as the ride is not yet over.
